name: The BioWare Forum: Dark
description:
Reskins the BioWare forum in a dark style. Also increases font sizes.
Always contains all non-colour changes of style 98563.
additional_info:
<dl>
<dt>2014-03-01</dt>
<dd>Fix text colours in thread summary.</dd>
<dd>Fix flighty background colour in Quick Navigation popup.</dd>
<dd>Fix accidental bad text colour in login popup.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-28</dt>
<dd>Resolve colour issues in dropdowns and popups and on profile and settings page.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-27</dt>
<dd>Initial release.</dd>
</dl>
